divs: sighting detailson 7\21\12 i was in my yard at about 11:30 pm walking my dog before i went to bed.i just happened to look up and noticed what a crystal clear night it was and how bright the stars were. i tried to find the big dipper when i noticed what i thought was a star only brighter than the others. i then thought it must be the north star. i observed this for about 20 seconds and this light suddenly got brighter and then seemed to ascend very quickly getting smaller but not diminishing in brightness. this lasted about for 5 seconds until i could no longer see it. i was confused as to what i saw and thought to wake my wife but it was already gone, i then thoght mybe it would come back so i returned the dog to the house and steped outside for awhile but saw nothing else.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Newtown
There were no other sightings in Newtown on or around July 21st 2012
Summary: Sighted the object between a group of stars then it acended quickly out of sight
